step.context: \textbf{Check Point\#1: }\text{Is the following function}\\ \text{defined and continuous in }\left[0 , \dfrac{\pi}{2}\right]?
step.tex: \text{Yes.}\cos 2x \text{ is simply the sine function which is }\\ \text{defined and continuous for all x }
step.reason: \int_{a}^{b} f(x)\, dx \text{ makes sense only if }f(x)\text{ is defined}\\ \text{and continuous in }\left[0,\dfrac{\pi}{2}\right],\text{ for e.g.}\int_{-\pi/2}^{\pi/2}\dfrac{dx}{\cos 2x} \\ \text{does not because}\dfrac{1}{\cos 2x}\text{ is not defined at }x=0.
